author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa unveiled life-size bronze statues of Kavimani Desigavinayagam Pillai at Suchindram and Chidambaranathan, who strove for the merger Kanyakumari district with Tamil Nadu, at Kaliyakkavilai on Monday through video-conferencing.

Collector Sajjan Singh R. Chavan, MLAs K.T. Pachaimal and Nanjil Murugesan and former Minister N. Thalavaisundaram garlanded the statues.

Ms. Jayalalithaa also inaugurated seven new buses to be operated by Tirunelveli division of Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation.
title: Jayalalithaa unveils statues
